intro: Rhynchosia debilis, commonly known as the weak bean or slender bean, is a flowering plant belonging to the Fabaceae family. It is a climbing legume native to tropical regions of Africa and South America. The plant produces small, yellow flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are trifoliate, with three oval-shaped leaflets. Rhynchosia debilis is characterized by its slender, twining stems and is often found in disturbed habitats such as roadsides and open forests.
